trend_summary: Across the series the mostly wooded landscape converts steadily into open farmland. Forest blocks fragment, fields enlarge, and a thin lattice of new roads and farmsteads appears. No sizable settlement emerges; change is driven by agriculture, not urbanisation.
notable_changes: Progressive clearing of forest in the centre and north, creating larger contiguous fields.
Expansion and straightening of field boundaries indicating mechanised agriculture.
Emergence of several new farmsteads and outbuildings, though still widely spaced.
Slight densification of unpaved roads and tracks linking fields and hamlets.
Visible decline of continuous canopy cover along southern hillsides.
